mapper.select: SELECT A.fence_id as fenceId , A.fence_name as fenceName , A.device_id as deviceId , B.device_name as deviceName FROM isaver.fence A INNER JOIN isaver.device B ON A.device_id = B.device_id WHERE fence_type = 'normal' ORDER BY deviceId, fenceName

SELECT a.uuid as uuid , a.fence_id as fenceId , a.fence_type as fenceType , A.fence_sub_type as fenceSubType , a.device_id as deviceId , b.area_id as areaId , c.area_name as areaName , a.fence_name as fenceName , a.z_min as zMin , a.config as config FROM isaver.fence a INNER JOIN isaver.device b ON a.device_id = b.device_id INNER JOIN isaver.area c ON b.area_id = c.area_id WHERE a.fence_type = 'normal'
